mapper.sql: num,writer,title,content,viewCount, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD AM HH:MI') AS regdate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_cafe (num, writer, title, content, viewCount, regdate) VALUES(board_cafe_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewCount}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM board_cafe
OR writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
OR title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT FROM board_cafe
OR writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
OR title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC ) result1 ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT result1.* FROM ( SELECT , LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY num DESC) prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY num DESC) nextNum FROM board_cafe
OR writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
OR title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC ) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
